name: Bus Mechanic- Auto Repair Shop
description:
Bus Mechanic- Auto Repair Shop is an amazing role playing simulation game in which you will go through a training of over haul bus mechanic/repairing workshop.

This game teach you how to repair a bus, if you want to be a pro bus mechanic then Bus Mechanic- Auto Repair Shop game is best for you for learning basics of a bus mechanic.

Key feature:
-Garage environment
-Many buses to repair
-Realistic tasks


So what are you waiting for go and download it for free.
